title: [K-12] Development of Customized Mathematics Strategies Based on Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: High school mathematics and foundational calculus concepts
context.additional_context: Flexible instructional design enabling personalized learning strategies in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their own cognitive and learning patterns with 80% accuracy using learning style assessment tools.
Based on diagnostic results, learners can apply three optimal learning strategies to mathematics problem-solving according to situational contexts.
Learners can improve achievement gaps by 10%+ based on whether learning style-based strategies are applied in summative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
